00033 #define PLANCK_SHARP_INTERNAL_H
00034

00036 #error This header file cannot be included from C++, only from C
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #include "sharp.h"
00040 
00041 #define SHARP_MAXTRANS 100
00042 
00043 typedef struct
00044   {
00045   sharp_jobtype type;
00046   int spin;
00047   int nmaps, nalm;
00048   int flags;
00049   void **map;
00050   void **alm;
00051   int s_m, s_th; // strides in m and theta direction
00052   complex double *phase;
00053   double *norm_l;
00054   complex double *almtmp;
00055   const sharp_geom_info *ginfo;
00056   const sharp_alm_info *ainfo;
00057   double time;
00058   int ntrans;
00059   unsigned long long opcnt;
00060   } sharp_job;
00061 
00062 int sharp_get_nv_max (void);
